channel.title: About Us on 🔐 BC InfoSec
channel.description: Recent content in About Us on 🔐 BC InfoSec

item.title: About InfoSec Club
item.description: 👋 Welcome to Bellevue College’s InfoSec Club! We are the Information Security (InfoSec) Club at Bellevue College, dedicated to helping students explore the exciting world of cybersecurity.

item.title: InfoSec Club Resources
item.description: 🐱‍💻 Kali Linux Attackboxes InfoSec Club is able to provide members with their own VM running Kali Linux. Connect remotely from anywhere using your Bellevue College email and attack over a dozen different vulnerable machines!

item.title: InfoSec Leadership & Advisors
item.description: Leadership Liam Dale President Daniel Brandao Vice President Antonio Ramos Treasurer Cody Lang Junior System Administrator Advisors Evan Drake Program Chair of Bellevue College Cybersecurity Rod Pascual Program Manager of Bellevue College Cybersecurity Previous Leadership Vincent Chau Former President Patrick Donlin Former President
